title: In A Bid To Reopen Schools, The CDC Said Fully Vaccinated Students And Teachers Don't Need Masks
content:
1. In A Bid To Reopen Schools, The CDC Said Fully Vaccinated Students And Teachers Don't Need Masks  BuzzFeed News
  2. CDC: Vaccinated teachers and students don't need masks inside school buildings  WPTZ
  3. The C.D.C. Issues New School Guidance, With Emphasis on Full Reopening  The New York Times
  4. Updated CDC schools guidance prioritizes in-person learning, even if all Covid-19 safety measures aren't in place  CNN
  5. CDC Updates Guidelines To Protect Kids From COVID In School. Plus: Vacation Tips  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ワクチンを接種した生徒と教師にはマスクが必要ないとCDCが学校再開のために発表
为重开学校，疾控中心称完全接种疫苗的学生和教师不需要戴口罩
爲重開學校，疾控中心稱完全接種疫苗的學生和教師不需要戴口罩
